website_summaries.verdict: Versatile helmet that provides high levels of comfort with air vents and excellent padding.
pros: Available in 8 different colors and 2 different sizes, ensuring you'll find just the right helmet
Matte finish gives it a stylish look that youngsters like
Design of padding near the ears and jaws is especially good
Meets NOCSAE standards for batting helmets
cons: Some models have a high price point

customer_reviews.title: Light High Quality Helmet
customer_reviews.text: My youngster started tball this fall. He has a small peanut head. It was difficult finding a safe and facemask compatible helmet. This helmet is high quality and fits him perfectly. IMPORTANT note: the product photos show 1 hole on each side for a facemask. They are not accurate. There are 2 holes on each side making most facemasks sold on Amazon compatible.
customer_reviews.author: TechMind

customer_reviews.title: Size and fit
customer_reviews.text: I bot an adult size, green. I am 76 and got it for fall-protection (can't hit it out of the ball-park anymore--actually never could). I have a 14-inch head circumference and it was a little too snug. Stretched it at the ear flap level (using a household jar for 2-3 days) and now it is comfortably snug. Wonder if I could attach a chin strap and/or a face-mask while out with my walker or trike. Excellent and fairly priced item. Zak
customer_reviews.author: Zak Vera

customer_reviews.title: It’s not dark red/maroon as the photo depicts
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is fine, I bought a senior size for my 11-year-old. It’s a little bit loose but not too loose so he has room to grow into it . My only complaint is that in the photo it looks like a maroon/dark red shade but when we received it, it is bright fire engine red so it does not match his uniform as nicely as I would have liked. But it’s not important enough to return it, I suppose. Just know that if you order scarlet it will be bright red and not dark like the photo.
customer_reviews.author: norcamills

customer_reviews.title: Not deep enough
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this helmet for my 11 year old. The sizes are off from his current helmet so we found one in the junior size and it fit, well we ordered the junior and it’s way too small. It doesn’t even touch his ears. So I ordered the senior size and it’s way too big. There is no in between and this is the helmet his coach wants him to have. We’ve never had a helmet not fit so this style is not good. My son is average sized maybe even small for his age.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: A good quality helmet but arrived with cosmetic damage
customer_reviews.text: The helmet arrived damaged with deep scratches and missing paint chips along the front of the helmet. I'm not quite sure if the helmet was damaged during shipping or if it was a return. Other than the cosmetic damage the helmet fits well and is comfortable. Amazon needs to do better when it comes to fulfilling orders though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rawlings is by far our favorite helmets. All 4 of my boys wear
customer_reviews.text: A tad bigger than expected. My 10 y/o wears it but had to get pad inserts. Rawlings is by far our favorite helmets. All 4 of my boys wear Rawlings
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 5 year old!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little league helmet. My 5 year old Son is built like a 6 year old and the bigger size fits him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: California-Space-X

customer_reviews.title: Makes my sons head itch so bad he can’t stand wearing it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son he can’t stand wearing it bc it makes his head itch really bad. He’s constantly having to take it off the scratch his head. It’s been doing that since the first second he put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Bricho0220

customer_reviews.title: Liking the matte finish
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet. looks great and fits right. The face guard that can be purchased separately for it (R16JWG-B) I'm not a fan of. It states improved view. It is not. The wire cage cuts into the batter's viewing while batting. We did not use it after trying it attached to the helmet.
customer_reviews.author: VMega

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: great price. my son is a bit small for his age so he hasnt quite grown into a lot of the full sized adult helmets. The senior version fit better than comparable fixed hat size helmets.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Clark

customer_reviews.title: Rawlings R16 Series Matte Batting Helmet - size senior
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Sturdy, well padded and a snug but comfortable fit on my 23 1/2 " head. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Espresso Lover

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice helmet! My major complaint is that the matte finish scuffs easily and already looked pretty worn by the first time we used it. It doesn’t really matter, but maybe a different finish would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great for price.
customer_reviews.text: Got the senior size. Helmet fits slightly larger than the SENIOR size Rawlings helmet I tried on at dicks sporting goods. However not bad at all. I can still use it. The helmet itself is great, comfortable, and well vented. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tried and True
customer_reviews.text: A name synonymous with baseball. Very nice look with matte finish. I would recommend Rawlings products to anyone. The only drawback is that there are only 2 sizes. The smallest size was just a little too small for my Son and the largest size was just a bit too big. He wears his baseball cap under his helmet to take up space. Overall, good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Amos Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong helmet received.
customer_reviews.text: We received the wrong helmet. It's shiny black and has only one ear cover.
customer_reviews.author: abigail

customer_reviews.title: It was ok
customer_reviews.text: It worked this baseball season but it cracked really easy. So I'm gonna have to purchase another one by fall season.
customer_reviews.author: A. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Helmet came with scratches
customer_reviews.text: Helmet is nice. Just wished it didn't come with scratches. Not worth returning. My son needs it for Tball.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Ann

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and fits good
customer_reviews.text: Works great and my son really likes it. He gets compliments
customer_reviews.author: Artie Mcfly

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet
customer_reviews.text: My son likes this and is happy to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina F

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet! My son is very pleased with the comfort and the ease of putting it on with his glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Looks slightly used?
customer_reviews.text: Bummer that the outside if the helmet looks like its been used. The padding inside was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha A Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this helmet for my 9 year old son. It fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Baseball Mom

customer_reviews.title: Looks good runs small
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is off from the info in the ad.
customer_reviews.author: Peacoat Rider

customer_reviews.title: Great color, price, and fit.
customer_reviews.text: Great batting helmets. These are a med/dark gray in flat matte. Stickers peel off easily if you want to customize (which I did). The entire team has these helmets now. They come in Jr. and Sr. sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Amber B

customer_reviews.title: Love the Helmet!
customer_reviews.text: The fit was great and comfortable. Price was good for the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Karen K. Patton

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: The fit was as described in the description and was able to mount a face mask to it
customer_reviews.author: Dustin L

customer_reviews.title: Rawlings helmet...
customer_reviews.text: Rawlings helmet like you see at the store. Better price and no worries about parking.
customer_reviews.author: JmpnFences

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Sharp-looking helmet. Comfortable too. My boys each have one and they really like them.
customer_reviews.author: mom-of-four

customer_reviews.title: Batter up!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great color! My son loves this helmet. Great price, comfort and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great head protection and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet already have red one needed a black one for school league. Stuck with the helmet that fit with comfort and protection
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great. I recommend the Rawlings jaw extensions. Took me 3 minutes to install
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalo Garcia Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Price- Great Product- Fast Shipping. works perfectly for the baseball league
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product ... a ton of use - still looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! My son who wear glasses can get this ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! My son who wear glasses can get this on and off easy with it knocking them off while still fitting snug.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality helmet. My daughter used it in softball this season; no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Mike5978

customer_reviews.title: Needs a little attention
customer_reviews.text: The glue came off and screws wouldn’t go in my husband had to fix it. Good after that
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Hines

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great (very comfortable). Great looking. All in all I’m very satisfied with the value and function.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great batting helmet for my 5 year old t-ball player. The matte finish looks great!
customer_reviews.author: D Williams

customer_reviews.title: He is 6 and fit him perfect
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! He is 6 and fit him perfect
customer_reviews.author: Elaina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery good quality and there’s nothing you can write bad about it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like the matte finish
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking helmet and very roomy for my son's big head :-)
customer_reviews.author: C. Tomas

customer_reviews.title: Sticky residue
customer_reviews.text: Helmet itself is nice. However, stickers on front leave a very sticky residue that is not coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Roshelle R.

customer_reviews.title: Color wasn’t right.
customer_reviews.text: It looked purple instead of smoke color, we returned for black.
customer_reviews.author: estesmarie

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Size must run small, ordered the senior size but fits like a youth on my 13 year old
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and and very comfortable and you're getting exactly what's advertised
customer_reviews.author: Jerome L.

customer_reviews.title: These may have been last years model but the matte ...
customer_reviews.text: These may have been last years model but the matte red is faded to maroon so half my team is wearing a different color helmet. And the stickers left residue all over the front that will not come off.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Nice Helmet
customer_reviews.text: The helmet fit great. It was cheaper that the sporting goods store and it was the color we needed.
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of this helmet. Fit my sons head perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lastroski Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Matte is great
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is great. We love the matte feature and it is a great fit for our daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet. Fits my 15 year old son perfectly. Never been disappointed with Rawlings helmets.
customer_reviews.author: Flynnyrd

product_meta.title: Rawlings R16 Series Matte Batting Helmet
feature_bullets: Wrapped jaw pads for improved comfort
Heat exchange vents rapidly circulate cooler, ambient Air
